Text:
Mathijs Kok is fuming right now, maybe. Perhaps he realizes Aerosoft has acquired all they can off the initial release and is ready to give this product more exposure. I for one wouldn't buy it, because I am too poor, but I recommend anyone who likes it to support the developer. Realistically we do have to give them incentive to make more releases. Seems like a man of his stature isn't doing too bad thus far. Mr Kok on SOPA: "This is how stupid this law is. Every cent I own is paid for by copyrights but this is NOT the way to protect them." Hear, hear.
http://forum.aerosoft.com/index.php?/topic/51945-sopa-and-the-blackout-what-cost-to-stop-piracy/

Not my cup on tea , but thanks aarque for amazing Job there.
keep it up.

BTW - most of my FSX addons I use, I purchase, even though I could D/L in PB or other sites like it - just an FYI.

When I like a product : say I fly it over 10 hours, I purchase it. I support A2A for their accusim line of products, I bought the Diamond DA20-100 Katana 4X from Aerosoft. Those planes are wonderful. If A2A would try to develop an accusim helicopter it would be a revolution.

agreed, the plane seems very skittish on the ground, spinning out and darting off the runway. Perhaps an implementation of the advanced flight model I am not skilled enough to operate. Nonetheless, I really wanted a CDF liveried plane, so..
"Mathijs Kok is a dumbass"  That is fucking funny i cant stop laughing he is a dumbass
